name: Autobahn Raser II
description:
The second installment in the German spin-off of Davilex' Racer series. Again the player gets to race on the German Autobahn.

The player can expect to be pursued by the police while he races illegal street races on the highway and the following cities: Dortmund, Frankfurt, Munich, Vienna, Hamburg and Berlin.

The player can choose between 13 different vehicles to race with.
